title: Triangle Area Problem
problem: A right triangle has legs of length 5 cm and 12 cm. What is the area of the triangle, and what is the length of the hypotenuse?
expected_reasoning: Given: Right triangle with legs a = 5 cm and b = 12 cm
Area of right triangle = (1/2) × base × height
For hypotenuse, use Pythagorean theorem: c² = a² + b²
Verify: This is a 5-12-13 Pythagorean triple
